meanings.definition: A person who travels a particular route regularly.
meanings.sent1: The routemen delivered mail to our neighborhood every day.
meanings.sent2: The routemen on the bus always greet us with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The routemen were like clockwork, never missing a day on their route.
meanings.sent4: The routemen were the unsung heroes of the city, ensuring everyone received their packages on time.
meanings.sent5: I always remember the routemen in their bright uniforms driving by each morning.

meanings.definition: A group of people traveling together on a specific route.
meanings.sent1: The routemen on the tour bus were excited to explore the new city.
meanings.sent2: We joined the routemen on the hiking trail for a fun adventure.
meanings.sent3: The routemen chatted and laughed as they journeyed together.
meanings.sent4: The routemen formed a colorful line winding through the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The routemen sang songs together as they traveled on the bus.

meanings.definition: To plan or follow a specific route for travel.
meanings.sent1: She carefully routemened their road trip to visit all the national parks.
meanings.sent2: The captain routemened the ship's course to avoid the storm.
meanings.sent3: We routemened our way through the maze, trying not to get lost.
meanings.sent4: The explorer routemened his journey through the dense jungle.
meanings.sent5: The GPS routemened us through the city streets, guiding us to our destination.
